description:
Looking for a new challenge? The Oz Store, a well-known cannabis retail chain in Eastern Ontario, has an opening for a part time Retail Associate & Driver (vehicle provided by store) to join our store in Orleans, Ottawa. We welcome an application from anyone seeking a long term career with opportunities for growth, including promotion to Key Holder and Key Lead (and perhaps even store manager at a new location).
This is a starting position and remuneration begins at $17.25 per hour, with opportunities for tips. If you stay with our organization and move up to full time hours, you may become eligible for health care related benefits, e.g. dental and vision.
The ideal candidate should:
-enjoy dealing with the public in a fast-paced environment
-have a licence and clean driving record
-have a high school diploma
-be able to function within a team setting
-be knowledgeable and passionate about legal Cannabis products
-have a keen attention to detail, and a willingness to learn
Responsibilities Include:
-Carrying out cashier duties (taking orders and cashing out customers at the till)
-Answering phones and appropriately helping customers with their inquiries
-Gathering, processing, and packaging online orders
-Assisting the Keyholders/Manager in receiving and organizing merchandise
-Maintaining the physical appearance of the store
-Assisting the Keyholders/Manager in the opening and closing of the store.
-Driving for delivery purposes (if applicable)
It’s a bonus if you:
-are bilingual (English with French or Spanish)
Job Types: Casual, Part-time
Salary: From $17.25 per hour
Benefits:

 On-site parking
 Store discount

Day range:

 Monday to Friday
 Weekends as needed

Flexible Language Requirement:

 French not required

Shift:

 Day shift
 Evening shift

Work setting:

 Specialty store

Ability to commute/relocate:

 Orleans, ON K1E 1E2: reliably commute or plan to relocate before starting work (required)

Application question(s):

 Do you have a clean/good driving record, e.g. no speeding tickets, collisions, or other significant driving infractions?
 Are you able to speak French?
 Are you available to work at either our Orleans, Ottawa store location AND/OR Centretown, Ottawa location? Any preference - or are you flexible depending on where you may be needed?

Education:

 Secondary School (preferred)

Experience:

 sales: 2 years (preferred)
 driving: 1 year (preferred)

Licence/Certification:

 Ontario Driver's licence (preferred)

Work Location: In person
Expected start date: 2023-10-25
